name: Cornelius & Anthony - Cornelius - Corona Gorda
additionalNotes:
Stephen Bailey and his family have been in tobacco for years and years, but it was only a few years ago they got into the premium cigar game. Now the proud owner of a half dozen fan-favorite lines, their newest line name is a nod to the great-great-grandfather of Steven. He was the first of five generations 
Cornelius & Anthony Meridian is manufactured in the La Zona factory in Esteli, Nicaragua, and a beautiful Ecuadorian Habano wrapper leaf. Underneath, Sumatra binder and Dominican and Nicaraguan long-fillers meld together into a satisfying medium-bodied experience offering layers of sweetness and spice with a buttery smooth finish.
